>
[Scholar's Inheritance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2582) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 110 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your parents devoted themselves to alchemical experiments involving elemental energy. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4). If you would automatically become trained in Crafting (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the [Alchemical Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=752) skill feat.
